# pb.Method proto

args: {
  key: "auth-arg"
  value: {
    meta: {
      http: {
        auth: {
          type: NTLM
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

args: {
  key: "auth-arg-2"
  value: {
    meta: {
      http: {
        auth: {
          type: PROPRIETARY_HEADER
	  proprietary_header: "X-Hub-Signature-256"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

responses: {
  key: "body-resp"
  value: {
    struct: {
      fields: {
        key: "message"
        value: {
          primitive: {
            string_value: {
              type: {}
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }

    meta: {
      http: {
        body: {
          content_type: JSON
        }
        response_code: 404
      }
    }
  }
}

meta: {
  http: {
    method: "GET"  
    path_template: "/v1/projects/{arg3}"
    host: "example.com"
  }
}
